subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Federico Higuain converted a penalty kick and had his first goal from the run of play in more than five months — a chip from 25 yards — as the host Columbus Crew defeated the Red Bulls, 2-0.
snippet: Federico Higuain converted a penalty kick and had his first goal from the run of play in more than five months — a chip from 25 yards — as the host Columbus Crew defeated the Red Bulls, 2-0.
